alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Martin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:16AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Martin, Johnson, northwestern Knott, Floyd, central Breathitt, northwestern Pike and Magoffin Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 416 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Foraker, or 9 miles southwest of Salyersville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carver Station, Tiptop and Lakesville around 420 AM EDT. Mason, Swampton, Royalton, Carver, Conley Station, Marshallville, Sublett, West Royalton Station, Skaggs and Duco around 425 AM EDT. Brainard, Gypsy, Gapville, Riceville, Swamp Branch, Orchard, Pyramid and Gunlock around 430 AM EDT. Dotson, Blue River, Bonanza, Dock, Dobson, Leander and Patrick around 435 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
